author: aryanXmahajan
text:
$2.3M sales intelligence system started as a basic prospecting tool

didn't realize what I had until a Fortune 500 exec saw the demo and said "holy shit"

one n8n automation:
- matches prospects to perfect solutions automatically
- researches 47+ company data points in seconds
- generates pitch recommendations with 90%+ confidence
- close rates went from 5% â†’ 23%

basically turned sales into a predictable science

"SCIENCE" + follow + repost and I'll send everything

going private in 48hrs before this spreads too wide
